author: mmusich
body:
resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/35344

#### PR description:

Address https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/35344 by adding a `fillPSetDescription` method to `CkfTrackCandidateMakerBase` and propagate it to `CkfTrackCandidateMaker`.

#### PR validation:

It compiles, not yet run a full integration tests matrix.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: [WIP] add `fillPSetDescription` to `CkfTrackCandidateMakerBase` and propagate it to `CkfTrackCandidateMaker`
